5272.NAME: Lucky Dog
5272.TITLE: Win good fortune, follow the footsteps of the BB Lucky Dog.
5272.CONTENT: The 2,000-line slot 'Lucky Dog' .The game innovates with wild symbols, consecutive matching multipliers, and incremental rewards. Not only does it feature golden symbols that can turn objects into wilds, but it also includes multiplier rewards that increase with consecutive wins. In free games, multipliers double again, significantly increasing the chances of winning big! Let 'Lucky Dog' bring you good luck and lead you on the path to wealth!
5272.PROMOTE1: Golden wild symbols expand scoring combinations.

5200.NAME: Hoo Hey How
5200.TITLE: Immerse yourself in the BB Vietnamese vibe and experience ！
5200.CONTENT: BB Casino invites players to indulge in the popular Vietnamese gaming theme with their meticulously crafted 1,024-line elimination slot, 'Hoo Hey How'. With 2024 upgrade, featuring a revamped interface, players can enjoy a richer gaming experience. The simple and easy consecutive elimination gameplay allows for the accumulation of additional multiplier rewards. In free games, multipliers can soar up to 10 times! The perfect fusion of popular local themes and innovative gameplay not only breaks through classics but also challenges new heights.
5200.PROMOTE1: Consecutive elimination gameplay with rewards up to 10 times.
5200.PROMOTE2: Vertical layout for improved mobile experience.

5275.NAME: Mahjong Ways
5275.TITLE: Endless fun in the BB mahjong trend！
5275.CONTENT: BB Casino join the wave of Asian electronic mahjong games with 'Mahjong Ways,' a blend of classic and new! Immerse yourself in the best-selling trend, featuring classic mahjong elements and the innovative golden mahjong wild card. Consecutive eliminations multiply scores, offering an unprecedented thrill of winning big. Experience the perfect combination of tradition and innovation on this extraordinary mahjong journey!
5275.PROMOTE1: Golden mahjong items extend consecutive matches, challenging a 5x reward.
5275.PROMOTE2: In free games, consecutive match multipliers can reach up to 10x

5252.NAME: Leprechaun
5252.TITLE: Leprechaun adventures await as the Leprechauns unlock endless luck for you!
5252.CONTENT: Explore the fantastical world of Leprechauns by stepping into BB casino signature slot game, 'Leprechaun'! Simply score consecutive matches to trigger special eliminations, immersing players in a continuous stream of surprises. Mystical elements like lucky clovers and leprechauns accompany you throughout, with every spin potentially marking the beginning of a lucky journey. Enjoy the thrill of accumulating multiplier rewards, where each win brings a doubling of bonuses. With the appearance of clover-framed symbols, there's even a chance to transform into a wild symbol after elimination, offering more rewards and surprises.
5252.PROMOTE1: Lucky multipliers with continuous bonus enhancements.
5252.PROMOTE2: Colossal Symbols increase the chances of winning.

5234.NAME: Awesome Buffalo
5234.TITLE: Explore the fantastical legend of the BB Wild West
5234.CONTENT: BB Casino presents the floating line slot game, blending wilderness charm with Western lore. Enjoy up to 46,656 ways to win with its full-screen floating line mechanism. Distinctive gold/silver frame gameplay transforms consecutive eliminations into wild symbols, offering greater surprises. Free games provide chances to earn additional multipliers, making your adventure more exciting. Every spin is a miracle, every line a surprise, with thrilling winning opportunities!!
5234.PROMOTE1: The gold and silver frame gameplay enhances the chances of winning lines.
5234.PROMOTE2: Free game rounds are endlessly stackable, with reward multipliers increasing further.
